Message:
At that moment,
a small light began to glow
from our clasped hands.
A gentle, yet powerful light.

“Cerberus, I won’t let go of
your hands no matter what.
So, it’s going to be okay.
You just need
a dash of courage!”

Big Sis gripped
my hands tighter,
as if she was sharing
her own courage with me.

I’m still scared of losing control.
Whenever I try using my power,
the nightmares from that night
come rushing back.

A witch’s power
comes from her caring heart.

And now, I feel the
kindest magic in
the whole wide world,
born from your heart, Big Sis,
wrapping around me.

“Yeah...
If you’re here, Big Sis,
I’ll be okay...!”

The two lights spilling out
from our joined hands
blended together,
flooding us in the warmth
of its bright glow.
